sentences.en: And then everybody else who came after that just put " ditto " underneath.
sentences.cn: 随后,在他后面到达的人便在下面写上 “ 原因同上 ”.

sentences.en: Capital Spending by industry just pokes along. Ditto residential building.
sentences.cn: 工业资本开支缓慢增加, 住房建筑亦如此.

sentences.en: Ditto , with luck, the prime minister.
sentences.cn: 与上类似, 首相也很走运.

sentences.en: Ditto credit : undeterred by souring quality, banks remain under pressure to lend.
sentences.cn: 放贷也可能抬头, 银行仍承受着放贷的压力,而并未因贷款质量恶化而收敛.

sentences.en: Ditto for your discourse on football.
Ditto goes for your teachers , listen to them, too.
sentences.cn: 就像你们听老师的话一样, 去听父母的话.

sentences.en: Ditto with your competition's ip address.
Gordon: Ditto, but what can you do?
sentences.cn: 戈登: 我同意, 可你能怎么着?

sentences.en: He is the ditto of his mother.
sentences.cn: 他的长相和他母亲一模一样.

sentences.en: I AGREE ditto, me too, I see your point, that's right!
sentences.cn: 我同意:我也是, 我同意你的观点, 你 说的对!

sentences.en: I love you so much, You said: Ditto!
sentences.cn: 我如此爱你.你说: 我也爱你!

sentences.en: Lister's dead. Ditto three Miami drug dealers and a lady.
sentences.cn: 利斯特死了，还有三个迈阿密毒贩和一位女士也死了。

sentences.en: The waiters were rude and unhelpful, the manager ditto.
sentences.cn: 这些服务员态度生硬，服务不周，经理也一样。

sentences.en: Two people who are going to be married ought to say ditto to each other.
sentences.cn: 一对准备结婚的人应该彼此观点一致.

words.tran_cn: 同上；同上符号；很相似的人或物

phrases.tran_cn: [口语]同意…的意见，对…表示同意，赞成(某种观点)

trans.tran_cn: 同上，同上符号，很相似的东西
